website_summaries.verdict: Sharp looking leg guards that have a good mix of protection without being too bulky.
pros: Uses extra protection in the knee cap area to ensure you're safe
Extra padding behind the knee cap keeps the gear in place, while making it more comfortable to wear
Shin protector wraps around to protect side of the leg from foul balls
cons: May have too much width in the shin area for some smaller catchers to wear comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Just what my daughter needed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays travel softball in Maryland. We have a variety of weather conditions to play in. (This past spring we had more snow-outs than rain outs.) Beginning in very cold weather and progressing through a very hot and muggy summer. She needed a new setup so I researched and found this MAKO series which is very flexible, good protection, and well ventilated. So far it has performed admirably and my daughter is "cooler" in both the fashion sense (the kit looks great!) and in the physical sense (much cooler in hot situations. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Work great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these leg guards for a couple of years now. I pitch in softball, and have taken some line drives off the shin, and wanted something to give me some protection. (Too many players don't know how to hit to right field with power, and end up hitting it up the middle when they try.) These guards have held up well for what I use them for. They are actually very comfortable, and I have pretty good mobility in them. They have also done exactly what I needed them for. A few less knots on my legs thanks to these.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Haws

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gear and perfect size for my large-ish 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: Superior protection as the guards go up above the knee caps. I was concerned about the "intermediate" size fitting my 11 year old. He was in the junior sizes before but has outgrown them (he's 4'11" and about 100 lbs). The intermediate size sounded so big but it was my only option if I needed bigger than junior, so I went for it. They do fit him! Obviously he has room for growth but they do fit and our catching coach said that now he doesn't look like he's wearing Lego-catchers gear (meaning the junior sized gear looked like miniature Lego pieces strapped on him). Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Saxr

customer_reviews.title: excellent protection in style & comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my high school age son who is 6'0 tall. Initially, he thought they were too big. After trying them on, he realized that the ones he had for years were too small. The ease, comfort, and protection of these is superior. My son is quite particular about how things fit and feel and he is thrilled with these. Least importantly - to me - he loves them because he thinks they look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Nelesen, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Great mobility
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these! Agility is a must for a catcher. He is protected yet, these are so light-weight and non-binding that he can run easily when backing up a throw to 1st. Vented well so the long, hot games aren't such an energy drain. Chasing passed ball (not that there are many) is so much quicker....much better than his last clunky pair.
customer_reviews.author: Livenjoy

customer_reviews.title: so I'd say the size is pretty accurate. My son really likes it and says ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the youth for my son. The fit is just a tad big for my son but that was expected based on what I measured my sons leg and what the size is (12.75"), so I'd say the size is pretty accurate. My son really likes it and says it comfortable. Looks well made and appears to have good ventilation. Good protection everywhere and the weight is good. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: m@gic

customer_reviews.title: Great gear!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent leg guards. They have a larger coverage area than the old gear we were using. They are light wait and my son says they are comfortable. Easton did a great job designing these. Make sure that you measure for the correct size though. You can find a sizing chart on Easton's website or just search for catchers leg guard sizing chart. They are somewhat expensive but they have been worth it, and seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit leg guards!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, my son loves the fit. They are also very easy to take on and off which helps during the game for quick turnaround between innings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great leg guards
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6' 1" and these adult protectors were slightly longer than other leg guards we looked at. They fit great and give him good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: They're okay but I don't think I'll purchase them again for my daughter. I think there are better quality and more comfortable shin guards out there that will last her longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Men only
customer_reviews.text: These shin guards are made for men only. Not teenage girls entering college. They are way to wide for fastpitch. The previews reviews are misleading.
customer_reviews.author: agostino tiseo

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made. The only issue is the thigh strap tends to loosen easily and I notice my son adjusting it frequently during games.
customer_reviews.author: V Cashin

customer_reviews.title: made the uniform
customer_reviews.text: Set it up and she was playing in the game and seemed to be enjoying and doing what it was designed for. Delivery was quick. I would recommend them again.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the few extra dollars!
customer_reviews.text: Mens fast pitch baseball- Fit is great! Very easy to move around while staying in place. Padding is all in line creating total comfort while hitting the knees.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old catcher LOVES these-
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these leg guards. Great for my 10 year old catcher. Make sure you check out the sizing. Can be tricky. But LOVE all of our Easton gear!

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10yrs son and it works as expected. Inner pad is good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son is catching in HS and he likes these. Fits him very well, 5'10"
customer_reviews.author: Chris Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: Easton MAKO Leg Guards are the BEST
customer_reviews.text: These are the best leg guards! They have a knee cushion that gives the knee extra protection when you block up a pitch. My daughter has had these since they first came out, wearing them 3 times a week for practice or a tournament year around! She loves the position, enjoys wearing the gear because it is so comfortable. I highly recommend Easton MAKO catchers gear. When we bought it they didn't have any for fast pitch softball so we bought the baseball catchers gear. We are purchasing another set because she has gotten so tall! They are expensive but they truly have better support and protection.
customer_reviews.author: terbear

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Easton Mako catcher's leg guards for my grandson for Christmas. At the second practice the knee plate broke lose of the seams holding it in place. On closer examination, I felt that it was a poor design and it was probably likely to happen again. I replaced them with another style.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Light and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits my smaller 12 yo son fine with room to grow (5' 1"). He has renewed confidence from the MAKO gear especially while blocking. The gear is light and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Trinergy

product_meta.title: Easton MAKO Leg Guard
product_meta.description: This Mako Leg Guard is designed around the athleticism of a catcher to optimize pop-time. This catcher's gear takes comfort and protection to a whole new level. The ergonomically designed leg guards fit the anatomy of each leg, with unsurpassed comfort.
feature_bullets: Sling Tec creates a ventilation channel between the shin and leg guard
Close fitting design inspired by the asymmetry of the human body
Ultra stable conic knee cap with extra padding stays centered for balance and comfort
